duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive strategies for strategic sourcing of national brand suppliers in the healthcare industry.
Lead contract negotiations with top suppliers and establish negotiation expectations with leadership.
Strengthen key supplier relationships and drive accountability for supplier performance.
Leverage data and analytics to negotiate contracts for goods and services, ensuring fiscal expectations are met.
Manage contract compliance, track performance metrics, and drive continuous sourcing improvements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business preferred or equivalent work experience (Master's preferred)
